Package builder.constraints.states

Class StateProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • builder.constraints.states.NodeState
      • builder.constraints.states.StateProduct
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocable, Freeable
    public class StateProduct
extends NodeState
    StateProduct
    Represent the state of a Product constraint.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) static class  StateProduct.Allocator
      The allocator that is in charge of the StateProduct type.
      When not specified, the allocator has an initial capacity of 16.

                       int size)
